ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment ! !   SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: Robe of Oracle on a 35th level mage with a 38th level paladin guard...  By the time you are able to take these two, I am sure you will know where to find em.
ygData.messageBody:
Robe of Oracle on a 35th level mage with a 38th level paladin guard... By
the time you are able to take these two, I am sure you will know where to
find em. Definitely not in Lower Gukk...

-----Original Message-----
